hero.title: Cash Payment Reimagined
hero.text: Meet the online payment platform, replace cash with an easier, safer, more secure payment, built for everyone & for every business.

join-us-section.title: Join us in making the future

paragraph.frst: A technology-first approach to payments and finance.
paragraph.scnd: We bring together everything that’s required to build websites and apps that accept payments and send payouts in syria.

paragraph.frst: e-Cash mission is to drive higher conversion by creating an online payment experience & help increase sales.
paragraph.scnd: Reach more buyers in more places, as single integration can give you access to different market, distribution channel, new geographies & new revenue streams.
paragraph.thrd: Keep data secure by using E-cash partners that will help you fight fraud transaction & keeping data secure.

paragraph.frst: e-Cash vision is to create ecosystem of trusted partners by Building commerce experiences alongside partner content customer’s trust.
paragraph.scnd: Bundle your offering with companion products or services to enable simultaneous purchases. Deliver a checkout experience that looks and feels like wherever a customer is buying.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.item1: Faster Payments with Best Success Rates
benefits.item3: Reach more buyers in more places

step3.title: Submit
step3.text: Review answers and submit to our team

step4.title: You are Done!
step4.text: Our team will contact you to let you know how to precede

mobile.title: Available On Mobiles Soon
mobile.text: We plan to support multiple platforms to provide the best user services, download our app from your favorite store soon.

partners.title: Partners

subscribe.title: Stay up to date
